title: FDIC Failed bank dataset
subtitle: This data set contains the fdic public data on fdic institutions.
description: This dataset provides an overview of financial institutions regulated by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC), emphasizing banks that have failed. Ideal for financial analysts, policymakers, and researchers. Data Source: Compiled from FDIC official records (https://www.fdic.gov/). Data Columns: 'bankName' (Name of the bank), 'status' (Active or Failed), 'location' (Geographic location), 'assets' (Total Assets), 'failureDate' (Date of failure, if applicable), 'acquiringInstitution' (Acquiring institution, if applicable). Usage: Suitable for academic research, financial market analysis, policy formulation, and educational purposes.

resources.description: Get detail on historical bank failures from 1934 to present.
